## ✅ Project Complete - All Tasks Finished!

This is an AOI (Area of Interest) Creation Tool built with:

- React 18 + TypeScript
- Vite 5 (build tool)
- Tailwind CSS 4 (styling)
- Leaflet + React-Leaflet (mapping)
- Playwright (testing)
- WMS Layer integration for satellite imagery

All features have been implemented including:

- Interactive map with drawing tools
- Layer management panel
- Search/geocoding functionality
- Feature persistence with localStorage
- Custom map controls
- Comprehensive testing suite
- Full documentation

The application is ready for development and testing.

## Final Status

## Commands

```bash
# Development
npm run dev              # Start dev server
npm run build            # Production build
npm run preview          # Preview production build

# Testing
npm run test             # Run Playwright tests
npm run test:ui          # Run tests in UI mode
npm run test:report      # View test report

# Code Quality
npm run lint             # Check linting
npm run lint:fix         # Fix linting issues
npm run format           # Format code with Prettier
npm run format:check     # Check code formatting
npm run type-check       # TypeScript type checking
```
